Title: Establishes a pilot program to provide alternative dispute resolution and navigator services in child support matters
Summary: Establishes a pilot program to provide alternative dispute resolution and navigator services to litigants in child support matters in the family court under the auspices of the community dispute resolution center program.
LawCode: Amd §425, Fam Ct Act; amd §§849-b & 849-d, Judy L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act and the judiciary law, in relation to the establishment of a pilot program to provide alternative dispute resolution and navigator services in child support matters
